mapper.sql: category_id, parent_id, category_name, category_common_code, category_code, is_parent, create_area_code, create_position_code, create_org_sys_code, create_system_code, create_user_id, create_tenant_id, create_user_name, create_time, update_user_id, update_user_name, update_time, remark, del_flag

ali.category_id, ali.parent_id, ali.category_name, ali.category_common_code, ali.category_code, ali.is_parent, ali.create_area_code, ali.create_position_code, ali.create_org_sys_code, ali.create_system_code, ali.create_user_id, ali.create_tenant_id, ali.create_user_name, ali.create_time, ali.update_user_id, ali.update_user_name, ali.update_time, ali.remark, ali.del_flag

ali.category_id, ali.parent_id, ali.category_name, ali.category_common_code, ali.category_code, ali.is_parent, ali.create_area_code, ali.create_position_code, ali.create_org_sys_code, ali.create_system_code, ali.create_user_id, ali.create_tenant_id, ali.create_user_name, ali.create_time, ali.update_user_id, ali.update_user_name, ali.update_time, ali.remark, ali.del_flag
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_common_category
del_flag = 0
AND LOCATE(#{query.categoryName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_name) > 0
AND LOCATE(#{query.categoryCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_code) > 0
AND create_time >= #{query.startTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
AND create_time <= #{query.endTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM sys_common_category WHERE category_id IN
#{item}
mapper.update:
UPDATE sys_common_category
del_flag = 1,
WHERE category_id IN
#{item}
